title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.5 - Speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.5 - Speed limits

State Regulations
(a) Subject to
the provisions of section
1023.1
of this Part, no vehicle
shall be operated in excess of the speed limit as posted in or upon the bridge
crossings, in tunnels between portals and at the approaches to the toll
booths. (b) In the tunnels between
portals, the minimum speed limit shall be 10 miles per hour in the slow lane
and 30 miles per hour in the fast lane, except as posted. (c) Nothing herein contained shall be
construed to apply to police and fire department vehicles, ambulances, and to

Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority emergency vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
